attributes.action: Implement the Great Barrington Declarations recommendations.
attributes.additional_details: The current government Covid-19 policy is patently not effective or indeed desirable to and for the health and wellbeing of the population of the United Kingdom. A well thought out and qualified alternative is urgently needed to reduce the economic and health damage currently being visited upon the United Kingdom
attributes.background: Parliament to debate the full Great Barrington Declaration and implement it's recommendations.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552023
